paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val30Gly, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: leptomeningeal amyloidosis with cognitive decline, seizures, and gait disturbance
individual_records.evidence_sentence: He has a strong familial history of familial oculoleptomeningeal amyloidosis on his father's side, with a known transthyretin val30gly missense mutation.
Genetic testing confirmed this mutation in both himself and his father.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Gly mutation in TTR is known to cause familial amyloidosis, leading to protein misfolding and amyloid deposition.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is associated with a high penetrance in this family.
key_quotes: He has a strong familial history of familial oculoleptomeningeal amyloidosis on his father's side, with a known transthyretin val30gly missense mutation.
Genetic testing confirmed this mutation in both himself and his father.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted all relevant data regarding the TTR variant from the main text.
